about_the_game:
BLOODY SKIN PACK: New skin for Bigdaddy is now available!



Bigdaddy with his "Bloody Skin" instills fear into his opponents. The deep red resembles his power and countless battles fought on the battlefield!

Package also includes GShG7.62 Minigun Skin.

[What’s Included]
- Bigdaddy Bloody Skin
- GShG7.62 Keepcalm Skin

*Important Notice: If you do NOT have Bigdaddy in your Inventory, you cannot use BIGDADDY BLOODY SKIN.
